.. _install:

Installing PyWFOM
=================

System Requirements
-------------------

* Windows 10 or Linux
* Python 3.5+

w/ PIP
--------

The easiest way to install :py:mod:`pywfom` is through the Python Package Manager, `PIP <https://pypi.org/project/pywfom/>`_.

.. code-block:: shell

  pip install pywfom

From Source
-----------

PyWFOM's Source Code is hosted on `Github <https://github.com/>`_.

.. code-block:: shell

  git clone https://github.com/ryan-byrne/pywfom.git
